definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: and conj. even to, until (BH III. [[עַד]]; so Targum Syr. OAram. Nab. Palm. Eg. Aram. (Lzb:336 S-C:A 5 +));—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of space, even to Da 7:13; [[עַד־כָּא]] v:Da 7:28.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of amount, up to Ezr 7:22 (4 t.).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of time, until Da 2:20, Da 6:15, Da 6:27, Da 7:18, Da 7:18, Da 7:26, Ezr 4:24, Ezr 5:16 [[וְעַד־כְּעַן]]; = our against Ezr 6:15 (cf. BH, p. 724:a top); to (the end of) = during Da 6:8 [[עַד יוֹמִין תְּלָתִין]], v:Da 6:13, Da 7:12, Da 7:25. On [[עַד־אָחֳרָן]] Da 4:5 v. [[אָחֳרָן]]; and on [[עַד־דִּבְרַת דִּי]] Da 4:14 v. [[[דִּבְרָה]]].

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[עַד־דִּי]] until, sq. pf. (of past time) Da 2:34, Da 4:30, Da 5:21, Da 7:4, Da 7:9, Da 7:11, Da 7:22; sq. impf. (of fut.) Da 2:9, Da 4:20, Da 4:22, Da 4:22, Da 4:29.—Da 6:25 ´[[עַד דִּי שְׁלִטוּ וג]]…[[לָא מְטוֹ]]:: up to the time that . . . , i.e. ere that.
